author: shrimp0
content: Hi. Dumb question here too: kzg-wasm is intended for browser execution, correct? Just discovered it but getting import errors

author: acolytec3
content: Yes, I rolled it as a stop-gap for usage in the ethereumjs libraries since we intend for our libraries to be browser compatible.  Unfortunately, it's not perfect and the `emscripten` toolchain I used has a lot of very unclear documentation

author: acolytec3
content: It work under the `vite` framework though I'm aware of nextjs complaining when you try to import it.  Will be looking more at that incompatibility in coming days/weeks

author: 0xevan
content: I understand that beacon blocks are propagated with compression - are blob sidecars propagated with compression as well?
